Sentencas: Nanometric multiferroic namely Ag doped (BiFeO3) was synthesized using flash auto combustion technique and glycine as a fuel.
Titulo: Conduction and magnetization improvement of BiFeO3 multiferroic nanoparticles by Ag+ doping

Sentencas: Single phase rhombohedral-hexagonal perovskite structure was obtained by annealing at 550 degrees C, as determined from XRD.
Titulo: Conduction and magnetization improvement of BiFeO3 multiferroic nanoparticles by Ag+ doping

Sentencas: High resolution transmission electron microscope (HRTEM) clarifies the hexagonal platelet shape with size 17.9 nm.
Titulo: Conduction and magnetization improvement of BiFeO3 multiferroic nanoparticles by Ag+ doping

Sentencas: Maximum room temperature AC conductivity was obtained at Ag content of x = 0.10.
Titulo: Conduction and magnetization improvement of BiFeO3 multiferroic nanoparticles by Ag+ doping

Sentencas: The-results of this study promote the use of such multiferroic in solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Conduction and magnetization improvement of BiFeO3 multiferroic nanoparticles by Ag+ doping
